Uses of Class
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.core.GeometryBuffer

Packages that use GeometryBuffer
thothbot.squirrel.core.client.renderers Here is located WebGL renderer. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.core Contains all core Objects such as Vectors, Matrices and so on which are used overall on the project. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.geometries Different Geometries which can be applied for the Geometry objects. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.geometries.parametric Parametric Geometry which can be defined as a custom function. 
thothbot.squirrel.core.shared.objects Here are all Geometric Objects used in the Scene.
